author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hangzhou Binjiang Real Estate Group to pay A shares div for FY 2017 on April 25
text:
April 19 (Reuters) - Hangzhou Binjiang Real Estate Group Co Ltd :
* Says it will pay cash dividend of 0.83 yuan(before tax)/10 shares for 2017 to shareholders of record on April 24
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 25 and the dividend will be paid on April 25
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/DhkruU
